page.title: 17Schooling in Marton
page.content: Our school is called Our Lady's.It is in the nearby village of Princethorpe and there are about 100 children with four teachers.We can borrow two books from the school library.Some of us come to school in a bus and this year we went by bus on outings to Drayton Manor Park and Iron Bridge Gorge Museum.We sit on the floor for Assembly and some of us read at Assembly.We went to St Gregory's Coventry for the Inter School Sports: we lost the trophy this year.We cook jam tarts and then take them home. I like school.
